mapper.select: select * from corona_info where stateTime >= str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d") LIMIT 1
select * from corona_sido where date_format(createDt, "%Y-%m-%d") = str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d") and gubun != '합계'
select * from corona_age where gubun != '여성' and gubun != '남성' and date_format(createDt, "%Y-%m-%d") = str_to_date(#{date}, "%Y-%m-%d")
select * from corona_vaccine where date_format(regDt, '%Y-%m-%d') = str_to_date('2021-08-12', '%Y-%m-%d') and sido != '전국'
